metadata.title: CVE-2022-22590 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 15.3 and iPadOS 15.3, watchOS 8.4, tvOS 15.3, Safari15.3, macOS Monterey 12.2. Processing maliciously crafted web content maylead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-22590` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.35.3-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.35.3-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
